body:
LEVI DAO 签署联合国关于在发生严重干旱和/或荒漠化的国家特别是在非洲防治荒漠化的公约（防治荒漠化公约）

LEVI DAO signed the United Nations Convention on Combating Desertification in Countries with Severe Drought and/or Desertification, Especially in Africa (Convention to Combat Desertification)

https://www.un.org/zh/documents/treaty/files/A-AC.241-27.shtml
author: 0x1F1C29c94aBe2b8F06B403Cc5a61c479167ebc3D

space.name: 上海约西亚网络科技有限公司
